name: The Invincible Iron Man
summary: When a cocky industrialist's efforts to raise an ancient Chinese temple leads him to be seriously wounded and captured by enemy forces, he must use his ideas for a revolutionary power armor in order to fight back as a superhero.
info:
• 中文名: 无敌钢铁侠
  • 原作: Stan Lee, Larry Lieber, Don Heck, Jack Kirby
  • 制片人: Marvel Studios, Marvel Entertainment, LLC
  • 别名: 无敌钢铁人
  • 别名: 变种奇侠前传：无敌铁人
  • 上映年度: 2007年1月23日
  • 片长: 83分钟
  • 导演: Patrick Archibald, Jay Oliva
  • 编剧: Avi Arad, Greg Johnson, Craig Kyle
  • 主演: Marc Worden, Gwendoline Yeo, Fred Tatasciore
  • 配角: Elisa Gabrielli, John McCook
  • 音乐: Guy Michelmore
  • 监督: Frank Paur
  • 制作: Lionsgate

relations.title: Ultimate Avengers 2: Rise of the Panther
